summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 7.8°C) and outside temperature (down 6.9°C), more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 7%), and drier conditions in rainfall (down 0.4 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in light levels (up 13590 lux) and cloud levels (up 605 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in light levels (up 15266 lux) and cloud levels (up 1556 m) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s average cloud levels is 605.0m lower than yesterday, 554.4m lower than the past week, 1556.0m lower than the past month.

Yesterday, cloud levels hit a low of 1059m and a high of 3380m, averaging 1119.3m; the past week and month reported somewhat higher averages.
cloud levels.summary: Partial cloudiness with some periods of sun.
